channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says he’ll sign executive order to lower prescription-drug prices
item.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday said he will sign an executive order to slash prescription-drug prices.

item.title: Stock futures jump as U.S. and China conclude two days of ‘productive’ trade talks
item.description: Stock futures jumped late Sunday after top Trump administration officials said the U.S. and China had “productive” trade negotiations over the weekend...

item.title: The ‘Magnificent Seven’ are back in the stock market’s driver’s seat — but are they still a buy?
item.description: The stock market’s rebound from its “liberation day” selloff has been familiarly led by megacap technology companies.

item.title: The ‘most important consumer earnings report of the season’ lands this week
item.description: All eyes will be on Walmart’s results this week.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
